_sText:
Ka_acidplat - Invisible Platform Acidbath
Map by Circuitous

---------------------------

Alright, this is gonna be pretty confusing, so read up.
Each team spawns on a side of this massive acid bath we've
prepared for you. Yeah, it's a knife fight. There's an
invisible platform that connects both ledges - you can see
the start of it at the middle of your spawn area. It goes
straight across to the other side, and it gets wide around
the middle. Watch yourself, though. There are holes in the
center platform, and it's real easy to lose your footing.
The acid will kill you instantly, so be careful.

That's all there is to it. Good luck.

---------------------------
Notes:
---------------------------

It's a really small map in terms of file size, but can support up to 40 players... sorta. Works really well with less than 20 players. It's a lot of fun to play, since even when you know exactly where the holes are it's still really easy to fall in. Definitely not a "high score" map, by any means. If you're incapable of laughing even when you're dying, you might wanna try something else.
